Rule.Name: Ensure accounts in /etc/passwd use shadowed passwords (Manual)
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Move all password hashes to /etc/shadow and ensure the shadow entry is not empty.

Rule.Name: Ensure /etc/shadow password fields are not empty (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Empty or placeholder password hashes found.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Assign strong passwords or lock accounts with empty hashes.

Rule.Name: Ensure all groups in /etc/passwd exist in /etc/group (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Missing group definitions for some GIDs.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Create the missing groups or correct the user record.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: awk -F: '{print $4}' /etc/passwd | sort -u | while read gid; do getent group $gid || echo $gid; done"
Rule.Verification: awk -F: '{print $4}' /etc/passwd | sort -u | while read gid; do grep -q -P "^.*?:.*?:$gid:" /etc/group || exit 1; done; echo $?

Rule.Name: Ensure shadow group is empty (Manual)
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Remove all members from the shadow group.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: edit /etc/group and clear members of shadow:x"
Rule.Verification: [ "$(awk -F: '($1=="shadow") {print $NF}' /etc/group)" = "" ] && ! awk -F: -v gid="$(getent group shadow | awk -F: '{print $3}')" '($4 == gid)' /etc/passwd | grep -q . && echo 0 || echo 1

Rule.Name: Ensure no duplicate UIDs exist (Manual)
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Assign unique UIDs to each account.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: awk -F: '{print $3}' /etc/passwd | sort | uniq -c | awk '$1>1'"
Rule.Verification: awk -F: '{print $3}' /etc/passwd | sort | uniq -d | grep -q . && echo 1 || echo 0

Rule.Name: Ensure no duplicate GIDs exist (Manual)
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Assign unique primary GIDs to each account.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: awk -F: '{print $4}' /etc/passwd | sort | uniq -c | awk '$1>1'"
Rule.Verification: cut -d: -f3 /etc/group | sort | uniq -d | grep -q . && echo 1 || echo 0

Rule.Name: Ensure no duplicate user names exist (Manual)
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: awk -F: '{print $1}' /etc/passwd | sort | uniq -d"
Rule.Verification: cut -d: -f1 /etc/passwd | sort | uniq -d | grep -q . && echo 1 || echo 0

Rule.Name: Ensure no duplicate group names exist (Manual)
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure all group names are unique.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: awk -F: '{print $1}' /etc/group | sort | uniq -d"
Rule.Verification: cut -d: -f1 /etc/group | sort | uniq -d | grep -q . && echo 1 || echo 0

Rule.Name: Ensure local interactive user home directories are configured (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Some users lack a valid home directory.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Create or assign correct home directories for all local interactive users (UID â‰¥ 1000).
Rule.Verification: awk -F: '$7 ~ /\/(bash|sh|zsh|ksh)$/ {h=$6; if (!system("[ -d \""h"\" ]")) {c="stat -Lc \"%U %a\" \""h"\""; c | getline r; split(r,a," "); if (a[1]!=$1 || a[2]>750) e=1; close(c)} else e=1} END {print (e ? 1 : 0)}' /etc/passwd

Rule.Name: Ensure local interactive user dot files access is configured (Manual)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: User "dot" files may have insecure permissions.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set secure permissions (<= 644) on dot files for all interactive users.
Rule.Correction: echo "Manual review required: find /home -maxdepth 2 -name \".*\" -type f -exec chmod go-w {} +"
